item.title: Om Vighnaraja
item.description: Hello all! This is my first post on my new website/blog, thus the title Om Vighnaraja (instead of a Hello World). My hope is to keep yâ€™all updated with content regularly. One of my favorite things about RMD files is that it compiles math so beautifully. For example, Fix \(d, w \in [0, 1]\). The indifferent agent \(\hat{\theta} \in [0, 1]\) can be obtained by the following equation: \[w\Bigg(\frac{d}{F(\hat{\theta})}\Bigg) - \hat{\theta} = 0.
